start.welcome: 👋 Welcome to Ghost Stories Bot! Use /help to see available commands.
start.instructions:
🔗 Please send one of the following:

*Username with '@' symbol:*
`@username`

*Phone number with '+' symbol:*
`+19875551234`

*Direct link to a story:*
`https://t.me/username/s/1`

Premium users get:
